name: Neighborhood
info: In front of your parents house is the perfect place to start selling lemonade, and it doesn't cost a penny in rent!

name: Park
info: A lemonade stand at the park? Great Idea! Many people play and exercise at the park and would enjoy relieving their thirst with lemonade.

name: Down Town
info: There is always people and tourists here bustling around and would appreciate refreshing lemonade

name: Beach
info: What could go better together than having fun at the beach and being able to enjoy refreshing lemonade

name: Hexa-Stadium
info: You better bring your A-game to this game, the masses of fans will want something to wash down those hotdogs!
